title: Android Developer
nameCompany: Mongolian University of Science and Technology
description: At the Mongolian University of Science and Technology, I refined my Android Developer abilities, focusing on Java applications for Android.
I developed a REST client connecting to middleware for GET and POST requests. I integrated a sensor system for real-time access, remote activation, and global monitoring with Wi-Fi.
Moreover, I crafted user interfaces and visualized sensor data through graphical representations.

title: iOS Developer
description: At CodeWell, I delved into iOS development using Xcode, Swift, and Objective-C. I contributed to projects like the 'Summer Ohrid Festival' app and another app to understand constraints and code.
I worked with Google Firebase, CoreData, and third-party frameworks like SDWebImage, TTTAttributedLabel, and SnapKit. I designed app interfaces and crafted iOS animations using Bezier Path and more.
This role enriched my experience in a multicultural team, fostering collaboration and understanding.

title: Front End Developer
description: At the Universitat Politècnica de València's Doctoral School, I was pivotal in updating the school's website as a Frontend Developer.
I created HTML content, ensured uniform formatting with HTML/CSS, and upheld the site's visual accuracy.
I also ventured into video editing for educational content and conference presentations.

title: Mentor Web Development & UX/UI Design
description: In Lodwar for my final university project, I volunteered for Learning and Service, promoting technology for a brighter future.
I crafted educational modules, evaluations, and provided mentoring and teaching to students.
I introduced tools and workflows, enhancing the organization's services and internal structure.

title: Full Stack Developer & UI Designer
description: At Value Villages, I was instrumental in creating software for NGOs combating poverty, focusing on vocational training.
I designed interfaces and implemented full-stack solutions, centralizing on empowering individuals through knowledge and training.
This role was pivotal in advancing the mission of NGOs on the ground.

title: Mobile Developer
description: At Oculid, I spearheaded a mobile app development tracking users' eye movements, enhancing user testing and UX analysis.
We gathered eye position data, leveraging machine learning for data visualizations like heat maps, offering insights into user-product interactions.
Such insights were vital for refining UX/UI designs for better user satisfaction.

title: Senior Mobile Developer
description: At Circus, as a Senior Frontend Developer on the Flutter team, I worked on product maintenance and new feature implementation.
Our app, used by thousands, expands to new locations monthly, necessitating efficient user base management.
I ensured optimal performance for our growing user base, adding features to a live production app.

title: Chief Technology Officer
description: As Head of Development at The Totem Studio, I directed the development of diverse web and mobile applications.
I ensured code quality, collaborated with clients for requirements, managed a developer team, and supervised code and project launches.
My dedication and communication skills were key in delivering top-tier products to clients.
